title: To SAO fans out there
body:
Hey wassup, perhaps i can do some research and try to release a champ like Kirito.
If i get enough votes, that is.

replies.body: fiora is kirito just like in the show she is op and no one can kill her if she has w just like kirito
TBH, I think Fiora more like Asuna, Riven is closer to Kirito, J4 for Klein and Caitlyn for Sinon....Teemo for Death Gun.

sorry to break it to you mate, but unfortunately; your wife has cancer.




Just joking, riven isn't a guy

Yasuo is obviously Kirito if you've seen the second season at all. Perfectly embodies his approach.

But there aren't many dual-weilding combatants in League. There's olaf, shaco, nocturne and zed if you count their wristblades.

I think that's about it. Would be nice to see another dual weilding attack speed based champ that follows a similar kit to Yasuo, with a lot of dashes and short skillshots.
